segments.text: I'm checking out in about half an hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whenever you're ready to check out , I'll be ready , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! As you know however , the day in New York has hardly begun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Therefore , I think I'll explore New York some more . But I need to store my bags .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , our storage facility is merely $ 5 an hour . You also need to leave a deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My luggage isn't enough of a deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , it isn't . VISA or MasterCard will suffice , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then . Let me put on my thinking cap for a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better hurry , sir . Remember you have to check out in less than half an hour .
segments.speaker: S2
